body:
# DMITRIY GURINENKO
_Ukraine - Indonesia  
(+62)8123­99­44­308 / dmitriy.gurinenko@gmail.com_  
_IT Specialist with over 4 years of experience, COO of IT Company ­ 4 year, Entrepreneur ­ 2 ​ year, QA engineer ­ 6 month_

## Skills:

### Programming:
* Javascript: ES6/ES7, Node.js, Express.js, React.js, React­Native, webpack, Q, Passport, Bootstrap, Lodash, jQuery, AJAX, Redux, Mongo, Moment, Babel, ESLint, Mocha, Power assert, Istanbul, Selenium, Webdriver.io, Postgresql, Redis, RabbitMQ, Saucelabs, Browserstack.

### System administration:
* OS: Linux, Centos, FreeBSD, Gentoo Linux, Ubuntu, Microsoft Windows Server.
* Virtualisation: VMWare, Vbox.
* Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL
* Web/Mail: Tomcat, LAMP, Apache, Nginx, IIS, Sendmail, QMail, Postfix, Courier IMAP, POP3.
* Network Services: ISP Software, SSH, DNS/BIND, NFS, NIS, Samba, rsync, rdist, DHCP, Telnet, FTP.
* Hardware: HP, IBM, Cisco

### ￼￼￼￼Operational management:
* ­Strategic development B2C, B2B
* Marketing and promotional campaigns
* ­Financial forecasting and analysis
* ­Development and implementation of KPI system
* ­Optimization of organizational structure and management

## Professional Experience:

**Kindbeetle**  
http://kindbeetle.ru/  
Automation QA engineer  
Indonesia, Bali  
April 2016 - Present
* ￼￼￼￼Kinbeetle Automation API development (company's own framework for human readable tests)
* Full cycle automation selenium web tests development
* Full cycle automation appium mobile (ios & android) tests development
* Continious cloud integration (browserstack, saucelabs)
* Projects frontend minor bug fixes and improvements (React / React­native)  

**BikeHouse Bali**  
http://balibikehouse.com/  
Co founder / CEO  
Indonesia, Bali  
November 2014 - April 2016
* Business processes development Marketing
* Website development
* Workflow control
* Customer relationships  

**Innovative Solutions**  
http://innovativesolutions.com.ua/  
COO  
Ukraine, Kiev  
April 2011  - August 2014
* ￼￼￼Control main company activities
* Management of heads of 8 departments (Sales, Development, Support, Global marketing, PR, HR)
* Operational document flow
* Financial analytics and forecasting
* Development and implementation of new sales strategies, technologies, business models
* Management of new remote educational project
* Constant work with key partners  

**￼Innovative Solutions**  
http://innovativesolutions.com.ua/  
Co founder / System Administrator  
Ukraine, Kiev  
February 2010 - April 2011
* Company servers setup and maintain Corporate website development
* Main partners and customers relationships Technical tasks flow for remote workers
* Control and evaluation produced web applications  

**RCS Components**  
http://www.rcscomponents.kiev.ua/  
Vice Head of Integration Services  
Ukraine, Kiev  
June 2009 - February 2010
* Development web integration services for main partners Support and installation of GPS monitoring equipment
* Management of technical support team
* Analysis of tracking data flow
* Analysis of support ticket system Complex reports of support department  

**RCS Components**  
http://www.rcscomponents.kiev.ua/  
System Administrator  
Ukraine, Kiev  
March 2006 - June 2009
* Support and maintain:
* Over 100 units corporate network Active Directory  
* Network equipment (Cisco)  
* Corporate Security  
* 3 Remote offices VPN Corporate Servers (HP, IBM)  
* Corporate Websites
